content: march seasonal chubby bunnies have arrived celebrate with these cute bunnies who are decked out in their finest and cutest costumes not only are we celebrating **st patrick s day** this month we re also celebrating **a menagerie of stitches turning 8** and we re commemorating with a unicorn which was my very first pattern i ever released to top it all off **march is national crochet month** so we of course have to celebrate with a ball of yarn while each month of these chubby bunnies definitely has a theme i try to make sure i include things that don t necessarily have to be for a specific holiday i love being able to keep things on display year round and things like a unicorn or yarn ball bunny definitely fit that bill this month our bunnies are- a leprechaun pot of gold unicorn ball of yarn pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins each character s pattern will also include what other materials you will need felt hot glue pom poms pipe cleaners etc skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease decrease back loops only front loops only half_double_crochet chain finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
